short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your writing skills in multiple languages with this extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improve your writing in English, German, Spanish or Portuguese by using the PowerWriting extension. The extension uses GPT3 API from OpenAI to correct your text or improve it to make it sound better. It is also capable of translating text or words from different languages to the target language.

How to use it:
* Configure the language and options
* Select text you want to correct or improve
* Right click and get response

You can try without the extension in https://powerwritingai.com/#try-here

Free:
* No registration needed
* There is a limit of 1.000 words

Premium:
* OpenAI API is not free, please purchase premium for increased limit.
* There is a limit of 100.000 words/month.
